speaker: Barista
text: Hi there! Welcome to The Daily Grind. What can I get started for you today?
hint: Try saying: 'I would like a coffee, please.'

speaker: Barista
text: Sure thing. Would you like that hot or iced?

speaker: Barista
text: Great choice. Any milk or sugar with that?
hint: You can say: 'Just a little milk' or 'Black, please.'

speaker: Barista
text: Okay, that'll be three dollars. Can I have your name for the order?
hint: Tell them your name, e.g., 'My name is [Your Name].'

speaker: Barista
text: Thanks! We'll call your name properly when it's ready. Have a seat!
